short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the new tab page with a randomly generated low-poly pattern.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces the New Tab page with a pattern generated by Trianglify.js. Reload the page or open another new tab to get a new pattern.
